subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd said his agent had talked to the Nets about trading him by the Feb. 21 deadline. Kidd described those discussions as a continuation of talks that began during the All-Star break last year.
snippet: Jason Kidd said his agent had talked to the Nets about trading him by the Feb. 21 deadline. Kidd described those discussions as a continuation of talks that began during the All-Star break last year.
